segments.text: I am going to resign . A few of the new staff have already left . Obviously , a lot of similar jobs pay much better salaries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But your company is huge . Can't they afford to pay the staff decent wages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we have a policy of paying according to seniority in the company , so new employees get quite low salary , no matter how excellent they have done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's shortsighted . By the time the workers are experienced and contributing . They are likely to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's why I am going to leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you have already worked there for five years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am worried about my future . I can't believe that our company is as big as it is . The company can only continue to grow by taking care of its staff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . The management doesn't seem to think that way . Anyways , you have to think twice before you act .
segments.speaker: S2
